name: spleen
function: Survival instincts, intuition, and immune system
location: Left side of body, below ribs

defined_mechanics.description: Consistent intuitive awareness and survival instincts

challenges: Holding onto fears that aren't yours
open_mechanics.conditioning: Pressure to hold onto fear and be consistently afraid

somatic_scan_instructions: Feel left side of body. Notice intuitive hits, fear, or neutrality.
regulation_techniques: Ask: 'Is this fear mine or someone else's?'
Release fears that don't belong to you
Honor spontaneous intuition, don't hold onto it

neuroception.safety_signals: Center operating in its correct frequency, no over-identification or conditioning
neuroception.threat_signals: Conditioning patterns active, attempting to be what you're not
